form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT-TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, I-130

full_text: Please instructions Screened by NARA 8/18/2023 /pewriter or in block lette Be sure this application and the attached address mailing label legible. Do not leave any question unanswered. When appropriate insert "none" or ^not applicable'' If you need more space to answer fully any question on this for use a separate sheet of paper this size, and identify each wer with the number of the corresponding question. UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION FEE STAMP OF PERMIT-TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball-point pen. issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE 1. YOUR NAME Sitlani Gopi Naraindas IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Deceipt Card with this application if you checked Issuans above. C/O IN CARE OF Ranjit Sitlani If you checked "Extension" you must submit the recentry per- (No and Street)(Apt. No.) mit you wish to have extended. MAILING ADDRESS 35 North Way ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IN U.S. (City) ZIP Code) Chappaqua (State) 10514 A- 34 733 885 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day. Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF 5/22/1912 Pakistan India Brown Whit HEIGHT 4 FEET 11 INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS 3. DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS Gopi Naraindas Sitlani GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED Seattle FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. 4/13/75 MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months in Canada or Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVA Gopi Naraindas Sitlani New York 8/10/77 NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: Air India 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROZ New York NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY Dec. IF 5, 1977 About one year DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL Air India FILL IN ITEM 7. ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MYI AST PERMI 8/13/75 in Sam Francisco, (City revewed State) 8/76 in Bombay India and IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED. STATE REASON: Permit was to expire few clays IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED. STATE EXPIRATION DATE after ALL APPLICANTS entry Handed it to Immigration officer at Kennely - MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20. INCLUSIVE airport 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: House wife NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY. ACCOUNT NUMBER 567-35-3037 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) Industrial Asss. Bldg, Apt B2, Churchgate, Bombay 20 India India 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): Accompany husband on visit to family Rev.
